thread.title: EHi Board Determined That Agreement With Teamsport In Best Interests Of Co, Shareholders

author: Reuters Editorial
title: EHi Board Determined That Agreement With Teamsport In Best Interests Of Co, Shareholders

organizations.name: teamsport in best interests of co

text:
eHi Car Services Ltd:
* EHI ISSUES STATEMENT REGARDING THE AGREED-UPON TRANSACTION WITH THE TEAMSPORT CONSORTIUM
* EHI CAR SERVICES - BOARD DETERMINED THAT ENTRY INTO AGREEMENT WITH TEAMSPORT CONSORTIUM WAS IN BEST INTERESTS OF CO, ITS SHAREHOLDERS
* EHI CAR SERVICES - BOARD ALSO CONSIDERED PRELIMINARY, NON-BINDING PROPOSAL FOR ALTERNATIVE TRANSACTION MADE BY OCEAN LINK PARTNERS LTD ON APRIL 2
* EHI CAR SERVICES - IN RECOMMENDING TEAMSPORT TRANSACTION TO BOARD, SPECIAL COMMITTEE DETERMINED IT WAS “SUPERIOR AND ONLY ACTIONABLE OFFER” Source text for Eikon:
Our
